name: authoring-helper
description: Authoring Helper is a Visual Studio Code extension to automatically or by command insert a header to your files.

authoring-helper.information.author.description: The author name to put in the header.

authoring-helper.information.email.description: The email to put in the header.

authoring-helper.information.dateFormat.description: The date format to use in the header. Year = yyyy, Months = MM, Days = dd, Hours = HH, Minutes = mm, Seconds = ss

authoring-helper.enable.author.description: Enabled = show author name in the header.

authoring-helper.enable.email.description: Enabled = show email in the header.

authoring-helper.enable.creationDate.description: Enabled = show creation date in the header.

authoring-helper.enable.insertOnCreation.description: Automatically insert the header on file creation.

authoring-helper.information.description.description: The description for your project to put in the header.
authoring-helper.information.description.default: Authoring Helper is a Visual Studio Code extension to automatically or by command insert a header to your files.

authoring-helper.information.customHeade.description: Use this to insert a custom header. Use the following variables: {author}, {email}, {description}, {creation} and {modification}. Enable Toggles will be ignored.

authoring-helper.enable.description.description: Enabled = show description in the header.

authoring-helper.enable.modificationDate.description: Enabled = show last modified date in the header.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
